item.title: Tearful goodbyes as Japan returns pandas to China amid worsening ties
item.description: The twin cubs’ departure will leave Japan without any pandas for the first time since 1972.

item.title: The last 2 pandas in Japan are leaving for China as ties are strained - NBC News
item.description: The last 2 pandas in Japan are leaving for China as ties are strained NBC NewsChinese Pandas Leave Japanese Zoo The New York TimesTearful goodbyes as Japan returns pandas to China amid worsening ties BBCBlack and white and sent back over: end of panda diplomacy as Japan returns bears to China The GuardianJapan says goodbye to its last pandas as relations with Beijing deteriorate Australian Broadcasting Corporation
